column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Ryu 's mother says : " Oh , are you the Avatar ?
#Text=" Ryu 's mother says : " He 's twenty - two , and you know , still just to figuring his life out .
#Text=" Korra says : " Well , I have a great opportunity for him .
#Text=We 're looking for airbenders to join us at the Northern Air Temple .
#Text=" Ryu 's mother says : " Ah , that sounds wonderful !
#Text=I 'll get him .
#Text=Ryu !
#Text=Get up here !
#Text=" Korra says : " Hi , I 'm Korra .
#Text=" Ryu says : " So you 're like the Avatar or something .
#Text=Big deal .
#Text=" Korra says : " Uh , I just wanted to talk to you about an opportunity .
#Text=" Ryu says : " Yeah , I heard you talking to my mom , and I 'm not interested .
#Text=" Korra says : " Well , you 're gon na be interested .
#Text=" Korra says : " You 're an airbender now and you have a responsibility as a citizen of the world .
#Text=" Ryu says : " Whatever .
#Text=I did n't ask to become an airbender , you know .
#Text=" Korra says : " Well , I did n't ask to be the Avatar , but I am , and I 'm fulfilling my duties .
#Text=" Ryu says : " So ?
#Text=You do n't have to .
#Text=" Korra says : " Yes , I do have to .
#Text=" Ryu says : " No , you do n't .
#Text=" Korra says : " Yes , I do !
#Text=" Ryu says : " No , you do n't .
#Text=" Korra says : " Well , if I did n't embrace my role , then our entire world could be thrown into chaos .
#Text=Think about that !
#Text=Is that what you want ?
#Text=" Ryu says : " Maybe .
#Text=" Korra says : " No , it 's not !
#Text=" Ryu says : " So what ?
#Text=Who cares ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Everyone cares !
#Text=" Ryu says : " I do n't care .
#Text=" Korra says : " Yes , you do !
#Text=" Ryu says : " No , I do n't .
#Text=" Korra says : " Well , you 're about to care , you little slacker , because you 're coming with me !
#Text=" Ryu says : " Stop pulling on my collar !
#Text=You 're stretching it out !
#Text=Mom , are you just gon na let her take me ?!
#Text=" Ryu 's mother says : " I think it 's a great opportunity .
#Text=Just try it for a week and see how it goes .
#Text=" Ryu says : " No !
#Text=Let me go !
#Text=" Korra says : " That 's it !
#Text=" Mako says : " Korra , enough !
#Text=Let 's get out of here !
#Text=" Bolin says : " So nice to meet you !
#Text=Good luck with your son !
#Text=" White Lotus sentry # 1 says : " We 're under attack !
#Text=" White Lotus sentry # 2 says : " Look out !
#Text=" Ming - Hua says : " I never thought I 'd be so happy to see your ugly mugs again .
#Text=" Ghazan says : " Great to see you too , Ming - Hua .
#Text=" Ming - Hua says : " I 'm flattered .
#Text=You busted me out before that girlfriend of yours .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " We 're getting her next .
#Text="
